Now I'm not saying this place was bad but...I've eaten at 25 different places in Spain and liked about 99% of what I've eaten.  On the other hand I ordered three things at Tapeo that were all pretty much gross.   Let's start with the pan con tomate which seemed as though a copious amount of sugar had poured on to it.  How a  restaurant in Spain could screw up this simple dish I don't know.  Moving on to marinated mackerel which was nothing more than a soup of gelatinous sauce over a minuscule  amount of fish.  Skip this spot.
